sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Craster's harem is composed of women of all ages, the majority of his wives are also his daughters.

{{Quote|You hear that, boys? Fuck 'em till they're dead!|[[Karl Tanner]]|Oathkeeper}}'''A wife of [[Craster]]''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is played by guest star [[Cheryl Lester]] and debuts in "[[Oathkeeper]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
She is one of [[Craster]]'s daughters who he has married.
===[[Season 4]]===
She's been kept by the [[Betrayers|Mutineers]], who have repeatedly raped her.<ref>"[[Oathkeeper]]"</ref>
